item.title: Upcoming changes to Microsoft Purview eDiscovery
item.description:
Today, we are announcing three significant updates to the Microsoft Purview eDiscovery products and services. These updates reinforce our commitment to meeting and exceeding the data security, privacy, and compliance requirements of our customers. Effective May 26, 2025, the following changes will take effect:
Content Search will transition to the new unified Purview eDiscovery experience. The eDiscovery (Standard) classic experience will transition to the new unified Purview eDiscovery experience. The eDiscovery export PowerShell cmdlet parameters will be retired.
Content Search transition ...
